title: Prince Harry’s Memoir, ‘Spare,’ Is Due in January. How Explosive Will It Be?
description: The memoir is expected to be a best seller but, after the queen’s death, some royal experts and industry executives say the project has become risky for Harry.
dc:creator: Elizabeth A. Harris and Alexandra Alter
category: Elizabeth II, Queen of Great Britain
media:credit: Pool photo by Stephane De Sakutin
media:description: Prince Harry struck a competitive, and lucrative, multi-book deal that had as its main attraction a memoir which he said would be a frank accounting of his life. Since the queen’s death, however, criticizing the royal family has become a riskier proposition.
